title: Senior Full Stack Developer
description: We are looking for an experienced Full Stack Developer to join our team. You will be responsible for building and maintaining web applications using Next.js, React, and Node.js.

title: Business Analyst
description: Join our consulting team to help clients transform their businesses. You will analyze business processes, identify requirements, and propose solutions.

title: UI/UX Designer
description: We need a creative UI/UX Designer to design intuitive and beautiful user interfaces for our web and mobile applications.
